entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Muskoka
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 2:27 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 97.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
